summary: I'm a fast-learning and enthusiastic animator seeking professional experience. I have over 7 years of formal art training, both digital and traditional. I'm skilled at design and character animation.

experience.title: Lead Artist
experience.description: Design custom D&D character sprites, "party" and menu screens, and backgrounds fitting 8-bit video game aesthetics for an upcoming Dungeons and Dragons YouTube series.

experience.title: Digital Arts Assistant Instructor
experience.description: Assisted in teaching digital art, film, photography, minecraft-modding, coding, and animation to kids ages 5-18.

experience.title: Canvassing Manager
experience.description: Gathered donations for the ACLU's proposed Employment Non-Discrimination Act for the protection of LGBT+ people in the workplace.
